titles.title: To amend the Investment Company Act of 1940 to prohibit limitations on closed-end companies investing in private funds, and for other purposes.
Increasing Investor Opportunities Act
Increasing Investor Opportunities Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Increasing Investor Opportunities Act
This bill allows a closed-end fund—a portfolio of pooled assets with a limited number of shares traded on an exchange—to increase their investments in private investment funds.
